entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:26 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 8:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -24.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -27.4°C
Wind: NNW 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Blizzard developing early this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
